title: Bug 112458 - Property Editor does not update when switching to Master Page viewer
description: Bug 112458 - Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to Master Page viewer.
OB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items.
EB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor should update to reflect the Master Page properties.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Switch to Master Page viewer.
2. Check if the Property Editor updates to reflect the Master Page properties.
